etymology.description: 会意: 宀 ('house') + 示 ('spirit tablet')
etymology.interpretation: This character represents the concept of a familial temple or an ancestral shrine, combining the imagery of a house (宀) and a spirit tablet (示). It conveys the idea of a place where ancestors are honored and family heritage is preserved.

examples.chinese: 这个家族有自己的宗庙(宗廟)。
examples.pinyin: Zhège jiāzú yǒu zìjǐ de zōngmiào.
examples.english: This clan has its own ancestral shrine.

examples.chinese: 宗教在社会中扮演重要角色。
examples.pinyin: Zōngjiào zài shèhuì zhōng bànyǎn zhòngyào juésè.
examples.english: Religion plays an important role in society.

examples.chinese: 人们在宗庙(宗廟)中祭拜祖先。
examples.pinyin: Rénmen zài zōngmiào zhōng jìbài zǔxiān.
examples.english: People worship their ancestors in the ancestral shrine.
